H0.text: The USS Langley was the country's first type of which vessel. Aircraft Carrier

H1.text: The USS Langley was the country's first type of which vessel. Amphibious Assault Ship

H2.text: The USS Langley was the country's first type of which vessel. Escort Carrier

H3.text: The USS Langley was the country's first type of which vessel. Hangarfartyg

A4.text: USS Langley (CV-1/AV-3) was the United States Navy's first aircraft carrier, converted in 1920 from the collier USS Jupiter (Navy Fleet Collier No. 3), and also the US Navy's first turbo-electric-powered ship.

A5.text: She was the sole member of her class to be rebuilt as a carrier.
